0.5.name: wordpress/tweet-my-script
0.5.description: Have you ever needed a script or task run on your blog and you were not near a computer with internet access? Well look no further than "Tweet My Script." This plugin allows you to simply use your cell-phone to text a short tweet to Twitter with a "launch code." When someone accesses your Word Press blog, Tweet My Script will check to see if you've left any new launch codes to activate. After each successful launch, the plugin records the previous tweet. This insures that the script being launched will only be launched once, unless the launch code is used again in a new tweet. This plugin can be used to launch any public accessible script.
